question.text: Choose the correct sequence of events, with respect to the fungal sexual reproductive cycle.

solution.text: In fungi vegetative, asexual, and sexual all three types of reproduction take place. The sexual reproduction takes place with the help of some spores like oospores, ascospores and basidiospores. Their sexual cycle is conducted mainly in three steps - <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a.</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> Plasmogamay: Fusion of protoplasms between two motile or non-motile gametes <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b.</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> Karyogamy: Fusion of two nuclei <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c.</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> Meiosis: Zygote undergoes meiosis and forms haploid spores.
